response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe it would also be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $900,000. This offer is tailored to reflect its true worth and provide you with an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We trust that you will appreciate its value and consider this proposal favorably. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
